The regulator found that IndiGo conducted critical airfield training on simulators unqualified for high-risk airports like Calicut, Leh, and Kathmandu. IndiGo is reviewing the notice and has committed to upholding the highest safety and compliance standards.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/not-qualified-for-certain-high-risk-airports-dgca-issues-show-cause-notice-to-indigo-over-simulator-training-lapses-for-1700-pilots-airline-responds/articleshow/123259092.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/not-qualified-for-certain-high-risk-airports-dgca-issues-show-cause-notice-to-indigo-over-simulator-training-lapses-for-1700-pilots-airline-responds/articleshow/123259092.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 18:01:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50946" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123259640,imgsize-50946.cms"/></item><item><title>After 11 years, MS Dhoni's Rs 100-crore defamation case to finally go to trial</title><description><![CDATA[Mahendra Singh Dhoni's decade-old defamation case is finally heading to trial, as the Madras High Court has ordered proceedings to begin. Dhoni filed a Rs 100 crore suit against Zee Media and others, accusing them of falsely linking him to the IPL betting scandal. He will be available for examination, seeking to clear his name from baseless allegations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/after-11-years-ms-dhonis-rs-100-crore-defamation-case-to-finally-go-to-trial/articleshow/123258664.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/after-11-years-ms-dhonis-rs-100-crore-defamation-case-to-finally-go-to-trial/articleshow/123258664.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 17:43:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31484" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123258739,imgsize-31484.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI’s ‘warning shot’ at Indian IT: Analyst says it could hit revenue model</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI's GPT-5 launch poses a threat to India's IT sector, potentially causing a 2-3% revenue decline due to enhanced AI coding capabilities. While AI improves productivity and shifts billing models, firms face challenges adapting to outcome-based pricing. Experts predict short-term pain but long-term gains as new AI opportunities emerge, requiring IT firms to overhaul delivery models.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-may-have-just-fired-a-warning-shot-at-indian-it-companies-revenue-model-says-analyst-note-but-theres-also-/articleshow/123256526.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-may-have-just-fired-a-warning-shot-at-indian-it-companies-revenue-model-says-analyst-note-but-theres-also-/articleshow/123256526.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 15:47:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="480076" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123256517,imgsize-480076.cms"/></item><item><title>Big 'Make in India' push! Cabinet approves four new semiconductor projects - details</title><description><![CDATA[The Union Cabinet has approved four new semiconductor projects under the India Semiconductor Mission, boosting the nation's ecosystem. These projects, with an investment of Rs 4,600 crore, include India's first commercial compound fabrication facility and an advanced glass-based substrate packaging unit.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/big-make-in-india-push-cabinet-approves-four-new-semiconductor-projects-cumulative-investment-of-around-rs-4600-crore-eyed-check-details/articleshow/123256391.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/big-make-in-india-push-cabinet-approves-four-new-semiconductor-projects-cumulative-investment-of-around-rs-4600-crore-eyed-check-details/articleshow/123256391.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 15:48:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51636" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123256541,imgsize-51636.cms"/></item><item><title>'No coercive action': Big SC relief for owners of old vehicles; issues notice</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has provided temporary relief to owners of older vehicles in Delhi-NCR. An interim order protects owners of diesel vehicles over 10 years old and petrol vehicles over 15 years old from coercive action.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-coercive-action-for-4-weeks-sc-relief-for-owners-of-old-petrol-diesel-vehicles-in-ncr-top-court-issues-notice-to-delhi-govt/articleshow/123257357.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-coercive-action-for-4-weeks-sc-relief-for-owners-of-old-petrol-diesel-vehicles-in-ncr-top-court-issues-notice-to-delhi-govt/articleshow/123257357.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 16:52:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2012089" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123258455,imgsize-2012089.cms"/></item><item><title>Record-breaker! Brevis shatters multiple T20I milestones in one match</title><description><![CDATA[Dewald Brevis, the Chennai Super Kings batsman, exploded with an unbeaten 125 off 56 balls against Australia in the second T20I at Marrara Cricket Ground. His record-breaking innings, featuring 12 fours and eight sixes, propelled South Africa to their highest T20I total against Australia, 218 for seven. Brevis's century, reached in just 41 balls, is the second-fastest for South Africa.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/record-breaker-dewald-brevis-shatters-multiple-t20i-milestones-in-one-match/articleshow/123259310.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/record-breaker-dewald-brevis-shatters-multiple-t20i-milestones-in-one-match/articleshow/123259310.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 18:25:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="29518" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123259495,imgsize-29518.cms"/></item><item><title>Intel issues statement on CEO's meeting with Trump after he asked for his resignation</title><description><![CDATA[Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan met President Trump after criticism over China ties. Intel issued a statement affirming commitment to US technology leadership. Trump described the meeting as "very interesting." Discussions will continue next week. This follows concerns raised about Tan's past business relationships. Intel seeks to protect federal funding for domestic manufacturing. Tan assumed Intel's leadership in March.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/intel-issues-statement-on-ceos-meeting-with-us-president-trump-after-he-asked-for-his-resignation-says-mr-tan-had/articleshow/123258506.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/intel-issues-statement-on-ceos-meeting-with-us-president-trump-after-he-asked-for-his-resignation-says-mr-tan-had/articleshow/123258506.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 17:30:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="53548" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123258462,imgsize-53548.cms"/></item><item><title>Devil lies in action: Why injury-prone Bumrah's workload management is crucial</title><description><![CDATA[Since his 2018 Test debut, Jasprit Bumrah’s career has been plagued by recurring back injuries, beginning with a stress fracture in 2019. The problem resurfaced in 2022, forcing multiple long layoffs, surgery in 2023, and missed major tournaments. Earlier this year, back spasms sidelined him again, underlining the persistent toll his unique bowling action takes on his body.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/devil-lies-in-action-what-makes-jasprit-bumrah-injury-prone-why-his-workload-management-is-crucial/articleshow/123252041.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/devil-lies-in-action-what-makes-jasprit-bumrah-injury-prone-why-his-workload-management-is-crucial/articleshow/123252041.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 12:34:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SHUBHANSHU DWIVEDI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="76350" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123252269,imgsize-76350.cms"/></item><item><title>Sports Bill will end stagnation; bring in transparency: PT Usha</title><description><![CDATA[P T Usha, President of the Indian Olympic Association, strongly supports the National Sports Governance Bill, emphasizing its potential to revolutionize Indian sports administration by introducing transparency and accountability. Usha highlighted the bill's key provisions, including the establishment of a National Sports Board and a National Sports Tribunal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/sports-bill-will-end-stagnation-bring-in-transparency-pt-usha-in-rajya-sabha/articleshow/123258272.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/sports-bill-will-end-stagnation-bring-in-transparency-pt-usha-in-rajya-sabha/articleshow/123258272.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 17:20:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44210" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123258288,imgsize-44210.cms"/></item><item><title>125* in 56 balls! 'Baby AB' Brevis steals the show during T20I - Watch</title><description><![CDATA[Dewald Brevis, also known as 'Baby AB', showcased an amazing performance in the second T20I. He scored an unbeaten 125 off 56 balls against Australia. This helped South Africa reach 218/7. Brevis's innings included a variety of shots. He is also a leg-spinner. He dreams of playing for Royal Challengers Bangalore with Virat Kohli in the IPL. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/125-not-out-in-56-balls-baby-ab-dewald-brevis-steals-the-show-during-aus-vs-sa-2nd-t20i-watch/articleshow/123257334.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/125-not-out-in-56-balls-baby-ab-dewald-brevis-steals-the-show-during-aus-vs-sa-2nd-t20i-watch/articleshow/123257334.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 18:14:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="106544" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123259321,imgsize-106544.cms"/></item><item><title>Apple iPhone 17 series: Higher prices expected; new leak claims why</title><description><![CDATA[Apple's iPhone 17 may see a price increase. Tariffs and potential storage upgrades are factors. The Pro model might start at 256GB. US tariffs on China and India could raise prices by $50 to $100. The iPhone 17 lineup is expected on September 9, 2025. These changes could affect global pricing strategies. Buyers are watching closely.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-iphone-17-series-likely-to-launch-with-higher-prices-new-leak-claims/articleshow/123253972.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-iphone-17-series-likely-to-launch-with-higher-prices-new-leak-claims/articleshow/123253972.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 17:23:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20680" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123258353,imgsize-20680.cms"/></item><item><title>'If we are going down ...': Pakistan threatens to target RIL’s Jamnagar refinery</title><description><![CDATA[Pakistan's army chief, General Asim Munir, sparked controversy during his US visit by making anti-India remarks, including a threat to target Reliance's Jamnagar refinery. India strongly condemned Munir's "nuclear sabre-rattling" and questioned the safety of Pakistan's nuclear arsenal. Despite Pakistan's threats, India's military strength surpasses Pakistan's, with a larger active military and a growing nuclear arsenal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-we-are-going-down-pakistan-asim-munir-threatens-to-target-rils-jamnagar-refinery-shows-intent-to-hit-indias-economic-assets/articleshow/123250360.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-we-are-going-down-pakistan-asim-munir-threatens-to-target-rils-jamnagar-refinery-shows-intent-to-hit-indias-economic-assets/articleshow/123250360.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 10:55:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1077529" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123250488,imgsize-1077529.cms"/></item><item><title>Vote 'chori' row: Oppn protests SIR; MPs wear '124-yr-old Minta Devi' T-shirts</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vote-chori-row-oppn-holds-protest-against-sir-mps-wear-124-year-old-minta-devi-t-shirts/articleshow/123256129.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vote-chori-row-oppn-holds-protest-against-sir-mps-wear-124-year-old-minta-devi-t-shirts/articleshow/123256129.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 15:32:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1101687" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123256216,imgsize-1101687.cms"/></item><item><title>Retail inflation plunges! July 2025 CPI at 8-year low; food inflation slips to -1.76%</title><description><![CDATA[Retail inflation has plummeted to a notable 1.55% in July 2025, marking an eight-year low since June 2017. A significant drop in food prices, with the Consumer Food Price Index at -1.76%, contributed to this decline.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/retail-inflation-plunges-july-2025-cpi-dips-to-8-year-low-of-1-55-food-inflation-slips-to-1-76/articleshow/123257302.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/retail-inflation-plunges-july-2025-cpi-dips-to-8-year-low-of-1-55-food-inflation-slips-to-1-76/articleshow/123257302.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 16:35:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="200556" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123257318,imgsize-200556.cms"/></item><item><title>'They call it a menace, we call it a heartbeat': Ritika on stray dogs directive</title><description><![CDATA[Ritika Sajdeh, wife of Rohit Sharma, has voiced her concerns over the Supreme Court's directive to relocate stray dogs in Delhi-NCR to shelters. She advocated for humane solutions like sterilisation and vaccination programs instead of caging the animals. The court's order mandates immediate capture and relocation, with strict measures against obstruction, aiming to create stray dog-free localities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/off-the-field/they-call-it-a-menace-we-call-it-a-heartbeat-ritika-sajdeh-reacts-to-sc-directive-on-stray-dogs-in-delhi-ncr/articleshow/123256098.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/off-the-field/they-call-it-a-menace-we-call-it-a-heartbeat-ritika-sajdeh-reacts-to-sc-directive-on-stray-dogs-in-delhi-ncr/articleshow/123256098.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 16:14:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31092" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123256998,imgsize-31092.cms"/></item><item><title>'Vote chori' row: Thousands protest KN Rajanna’s removal from cabinet</title><description><![CDATA[KN Rajanna was removed from his cabinet post. This followed his criticism of Rahul Gandhi. Supporters protested across Karnataka. One person reportedly attempted self-immolation. Siddaramaiah removed Rajanna after Congress high command directive. DK Shivakumar raised concerns about Rajanna's statements. Rajanna questioned Rahul Gandhi's vote theft allegations. BJP MLA R Ashoka commented on the situation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/karnataka-vote-chori-row-thousands-protest-kn-rajannas-removal-from-cabinate-supporter-attempts-self-immolation-amid-party-dissent/articleshow/123253451.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/karnataka-vote-chori-row-thousands-protest-kn-rajannas-removal-from-cabinate-supporter-attempts-self-immolation-amid-party-dissent/articleshow/123253451.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 13:16:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1126484" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123253464,imgsize-1126484.cms"/></item><item><title>Mamata vs EC: Poll panel summons Bengal chief secy; row over election roll</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bengal-electoral-roll-revision-row-ec-summons-cs-manoj-pant-to-delhi-over-non-suspension-of-tainted-officers/articleshow/123255851.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bengal-electoral-roll-revision-row-ec-summons-cs-manoj-pant-to-delhi-over-non-suspension-of-tainted-officers/articleshow/123255851.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 15:18:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20710" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123255861,imgsize-20710.cms"/></item><item><title>Team India Test captain Gill named the ICC men's POTM for July 2025</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill has been crowned ICC Men's Player of the Month for July 2025 following his stellar performance in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy. As India's Test captain, Gill amassed 567 runs at an impressive average of 94.50, including a double century and two centuries. His remarkable Edgbaston innings featured a match total of 430 runs, contributing significantly to India's historic victory.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/team-india-test-captain-shubman-gill-named-the-icc-mens-player-of-the-month-for-july-2025/articleshow/123257006.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/team-india-test-captain-shubman-gill-named-the-icc-mens-player-of-the-month-for-july-2025/articleshow/123257006.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 16:19:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="142222" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123257051,imgsize-142222.cms"/></item><item><title>Travis Kelce’s 13th NFL season: Fans blame Taylor Swift</title><description><![CDATA[Taylor Swift revealed her upcoming 12th album, 'The Life of a Showgirl,' on the New Heights podcast hosted by the Kelce brothers. The announcement, shared in a video clip, sparked excitement among Swifties and concern from some football fans regarding Travis Kelce's career. Jason Kelce's changed hair color also grabbed attention, diverting from the album news.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/fans-feel-travis-kelces-13th-nfl-season-will-be-ruined-because-of-taylor-swift/articleshow/123253015.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/fans-feel-travis-kelces-13th-nfl-season-will-be-ruined-because-of-taylor-swift/articleshow/123253015.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 16:25:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1026973" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123254674,imgsize-1026973.cms"/></item><item><title>'Ram was out of his mind': Tamil poet Vairamuthi's remarks sparks row</title><description><![CDATA[Lyricist Vairamuthu's recent remarks on Lord Ram, claiming he was 'out of his mind' after separating from Sita, have ignited controversy in Tamil Nadu. Vairamuthu's comments, made at a Kambar Kazhagam event, drew sharp criticism from TN BJP President Nainar Nagenthran, who deemed them 'anti-Hindu'.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/ram-was-out-of-his-mind-tamil-poet-vairamuthis-remarks-sparks-row-anti-hindu-says-bjp/articleshow/123253935.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/ram-was-out-of-his-mind-tamil-poet-vairamuthis-remarks-sparks-row-anti-hindu-says-bjp/articleshow/123253935.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 13:37:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="12458" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123253944,imgsize-12458.cms"/></item><item><title>Fatehpur mausoleum row: SP expels Pappu Chauhan for 'anti-party activities'</title><description><![CDATA[Pappu Singh Chauhan, a Samajwadi Party leader, was expelled for engaging in "anti-party" activities following an FIR against him and others for attempting to vandalize a 200-year-old mausoleum in Fatehpur. The delay exacerbated her injuries, and she was pronounced dead upon arrival at a closer hospital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/injured-woman-dies-in-ambulance-after-spending-hours-stuck-in-traffic-on-mumbai-ahmedabad-highway/articleshow/123240055.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/injured-woman-dies-in-ambulance-after-spending-hours-stuck-in-traffic-on-mumbai-ahmedabad-highway/articleshow/123240055.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 21:00:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>VISHAL RAJEMAHADIK AND PRESS TRUST OF INDIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1006047" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123248331,imgsize-1006047.cms"/></item><item><title>Nasa teases major discovery: Mystery object speeds through solar system</title><description><![CDATA[NASA has shared new details about 3I/ATLAS. Scientists estimate it is eight billion years old. It poses no threat to Earth. NASA uses telescopes to study it.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-shares-thrilling-update-on-the-mysterious-interstellar-object-racing-through-our-solar-system/articleshow/123254304.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-shares-thrilling-update-on-the-mysterious-interstellar-object-racing-through-our-solar-system/articleshow/123254304.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 14:03:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19328" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123254310,imgsize-19328.cms"/></item><item><title>Weed behind bars: Ganja-filled ball thrown into Maharashtra jail</title><description><![CDATA[A security lapse at Beed district prison led to a violent clash among four undertrial prisoners after an unidentified person threw a rubber ball filled with ganja into the facility. The order was issued during the case of Sukhdev Yadav, convicted in the Nitish Katara murder, who finished his 20-year sentence in March.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2002-nitish-katara-murder-case-no-jail-beyond-fixed-term-rules-supreme-court-slams-delay-in-releasing-prisoners/articleshow/123252550.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2002-nitish-katara-murder-case-no-jail-beyond-fixed-term-rules-supreme-court-slams-delay-in-releasing-prisoners/articleshow/123252550.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 13:08:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="161204" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123252495,imgsize-161204.cms"/></item><item><title>How Indian cities tackle stray dog issue; Netherlands ended it with 'benchmark model'</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has mandated the removal of stray dogs in Delhi-NCR, directing their confinement to shelters. This decision, made after recent US tariff hikes and EU sanctions, impacts Nayara's international transactions. Nayara is now seeking alternative arrangements with domestic institutions like UCO Bank to navigate these challenges.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/fresh-trouble-for-russia-backed-nayara-energy-sbi-stops-trade-foreign-currency-transactions-of-indian-refinery-doesnt-want-to-risk-us-tariffs-eu-curbs/articleshow/123252387.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/fresh-trouble-for-russia-backed-nayara-energy-sbi-stops-trade-foreign-currency-transactions-of-indian-refinery-doesnt-want-to-risk-us-tariffs-eu-curbs/articleshow/123252387.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 12:37:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57020" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123252714,imgsize-57020.cms"/></item><item><title>Who is Georgina Rodriguez? Cristiano Ronaldo’s fiancée</title><description><![CDATA[Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez have announced their engagement after eight years together, Rodriguez shared the news on Instagram, showcasing a diamond ring. Their relationship began in 2016, and they share a blended family, including five children. Rodriguez, a model and influencer, stars in her own Netflix series, 'I Am Georgina'. The engagement marks a significant milestone in their journey.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/who-is-georgina-rodriguez-cristiano-ronaldos-fiance-after-years-together/articleshow/123248552.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/who-is-georgina-rodriguez-cristiano-ronaldos-fiance-after-years-together/articleshow/123248552.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 08:31:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28202" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123249170,imgsize-28202.cms"/></item><item><title>ED faces 'wall of the dead' as Vadra puts burden on deceased colleagues</title><description><![CDATA[Robert Vadra, facing an Enforcement Directorate probe into land deals, has attributed key financial decisions to deceased associates, including Rajesh Khurana and H.L. Pahwa. This strategy mirrors responses from Sonia and Rahul Gandhi in the National Herald case, where they cited the late Motilal Vora's knowledge. The ED alleges Vadra was evasive and suppressed information regarding transactions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ed-faces-wall-of-the-dead-as-vadra-puts-burden-on-deceased-colleagues/articleshow/123246804.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ed-faces-wall-of-the-dead-as-vadra-puts-burden-on-deceased-colleagues/articleshow/123246804.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 05:49:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2028505" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123246815,imgsize-2028505.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[Poly Medicure has revised its FY26 revenue growth guidance to around 16%, down from an earlier estimate of 20%, citing a weak June quarter impacted by slower performance in Europe.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/pb-fintech-share-price-q1-results-net-profit-jumps-40-to-rs-85-crore-insurance-premium-surges-36-19646950.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[PB Fintech reported a total insurance premium of ₹6,616 crore for the first quarter, marking a 36% year-on-year growth, driven primarily by a 65% increase in online new health insurance. Core insurance revenue rose 37% year-on-year, while core credit revenue declined by 22%. Shares of PB Fintech Ltd ended at ₹1,812.45, down by ₹9.95 or 0.55% on the BSE.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Thu, 31 Jul 2025 22:18:03 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Jomy Jos Pullokaran</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/pb-fintech-share-price-q1-results-net-profit-jumps-40-to-rs-85-crore-insurance-premium-surges-36-19646950.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>

      <title><![CDATA[Pricol Q1 Results | Net profit up 10% to ₹50 crore on 46% revenue surge]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/pricol-q1-share-price-results-net-profit-revenue-rise-ebitda-margins-19646905.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[EBITDA surged 27.2% to ₹80.8 crore in the first quarter over ₹63.5 crore in year-on-year. However, margins shrank to 9.2% compared to 10.5%. Shares of Pricol Ltd ended at ₹431.70, down by ₹6.55 or 1.49%, on the BSE.]]></description>
